mapper.select: SELECT REQUEST_NUM, MEMBER_ID, SUBJECT, R_CONTENT, PASSWORD, UPLOAD, REGDATE FROM REQUEST ORDER BY REQUEST_NUM
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO REQUEST (REQUEST_NUM, MEMBER_ID, SUBJECT, R_CONTENT, PASSWORD, UPLOAD, REGDATE) VALUES (REQ_BOARD.NEXTVAL, #{memberId}, #{subject}, #{rContent}, #{password}, #{upload, jdbcType=VARCHAR}, SYSDATE)
